title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki - XWiki

KermitTheFragger joined #xwiki at 10:12 sdumitriu joined #xwiki at 10:15 tmortagne - (10:21): xhtml experts: xhtml validator is saying me that target attribute is invalid in a element, is there an alternative ? tmortagne - (10:22): the use case here is in rename template: XWiki.DefaultSkin sdumitriu - (10:22): tmortagne: Yes, use rel="\_\_blank" tmortagne - (10:22): sdumitriu: ok thanks abusenius joined #xwiki at 10:27 plunden joined #xwiki at 10:28 jvdrean joined #xwiki at 10:40 sdumitriu left at 10:43 (Remote host closed the connection anna\_ left at 10:55 (Quit: anna\_ sdumitriu joined #xwiki at 11:16 florinciu joined #xwiki at 11:17 mflorea joined #xwiki at 11:19 anamarias left at 11:26 (Quit: anamarias florinciu left at 11:35 (Quit: Leaving. anna\_ joined #xwiki at 11:42 anna\_ left at 12:13 (Quit: anna\_ florinciu joined #xwiki at 12:32 anna\_\_ joined #xwiki at 12:33 anna\_\_ left at 12:35 (Client Quit sburjan is now known as sorinello ([[email protected]](https://dev.xwiki.org/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection) sorinello is now known as sburjan ([[email protected]](https://dev.xwiki.org/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection) sburjan left at 13:22 (Quit: Peace and Protection 4.22 sburjan joined #xwiki at 13:23 anna\_ joined #xwiki at 13:26 sburjan left at 13:28 (Quit: Peace and Protection 4.22 sburjan joined #xwiki at 13:29 florinciu left at 13:32 (Quit: Leaving. florinciu joined #xwiki at 13:35 lucaa left at 13:41 (Ping timeout: 276 seconds lucaa joined #xwiki at 13:41 kibahop left #xwiki at 13:51 bbc581 joined #xwiki at 13:53 jvelociter left at 14:41 (Quit: jvelociter lucaa left at 14:44 (Quit: Leaving. anna\_ left at 15:49 (Quit: anna\_ Denis left at 15:53 (Quit: Leaving. plunden left #xwiki at 15:54 Denis joined #xwiki at 15:59 sdumitriu left at 16:15 (Ping timeout: 276 seconds anna joined #xwiki at 16:22 sdumitriu joined #xwiki at 16:49 anna left at 16:52 (Quit: anna anamarias joined #xwiki at 17:03 vmassol left at 17:10 (Quit: Leaving. vmassol joined #xwiki at 17:10 silviar left at 17:20 (Quit: Leaving. florinciu left at 17:29 (Read error: Connection reset by peer npm left at 17:58 (Quit: Leaving. florinciu joined #xwiki at 18:07 jvelociter joined #xwiki at 18:14 jvelociter - (18:15): Hi CalebJamesDeLisl . We have a failing integration tests in trunk that might be linked with your changes on the versionning store. npm joined #xwiki at 18:15 CalebJamesDeLisl - (18:15): Versioning store? jvelociter - (18:15): It's the importer testImportWithHistory test, that imports a document with including revisions. Only the last revisions in the package gets imported jvelociter - (18:15): while in branch 2.3, the test pass (= all revisions gets imported) CalebJamesDeLisl - (18:17): Let me look when it started. I can't remember fooling around in the versioning store. jvelociter - (18:18): I've started debugging and the diffs between 2.3 and 2.4 I see would be in that area (versionning store). jvelociter - (18:18): there is http://jira.xwiki.org/jira/browse/XWIKI-4265 jvelociter - (18:18): and http://jira.xwiki.org/jira/browse/XWIKI-5098 too (which is not in versionning store, but could be linked as well) evalica left at 18:18 (Read error: Connection reset by peer CalebJamesDeLisl - (18:19): Ahh, yes getPreviousVersion. jvelociter - (18:19): I don't have time to investigate further tonight, got to go in 10 min. If you have some time to look in to it that would be great. (I think it's one of the last issues blocking the release of 2.4M1). jvelociter - (18:20): I can help a little tomorrow if needed, though I won't be able to dedicate my day to that fmancinelli left at 18:20 (Ping timeout: 264 seconds CalebJamesDeLisl - (18:23): Sure I'll work on it. Looks like I broke it anyway. jvelociter left at 18:29 (Quit: jvelociter topriddy1 joined #xwiki at 18:32 topriddy1 left at 18:39 (Quit: Leaving. jvdrean left at 18:39 (Quit: Leaving. mflorea - (18:39): tmortagne: I have a problem with external images. If I write: [[image:http://thor.info.uaic.ro/~~evalica/img/x\_logo\_xwiki.png]] (notice that I have to escape ~) and save the image is inserted file. Then if I edit with the WYSIWYG and save without changing anything the escaping of ~ is lost, and the image URL is messed up as a result. So, [[image:http://thor.info.uaic.ro/~~evalica/img/x\_logo\_xwiki.png]] generates
